oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Life Of Riley - 1946-06-01 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC radio program The Life Of Riley, originally broadcast 1946-06-01, part 2. Featuring cast members William Bendix, Paula Winslowe, John Brown, Sharon Douglas, Warren Mills, and Joe Gilbert, with Irving Brecher (producer), Ashmead Scott (writer), Alan Lipscott (writer), Reuben Ship (writer), Lou Kosloff (music), and Ken Carpenter (announcer). Sponsored by Teel.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Life Of Riley episode -- Teel commercial (Ken Carpenter) -- Life Of Riley episode -- Ken Carpenter announces the cast -- Drene Shampoo commercial -- Closing statement (Ken Carpenter)
